thread.title: DELIA LIUZZA
thread.title_full: Brushy Mountain Bee Farm reviewed by DELIA LIUZZA

author: DELIA LIUZZA
title: DELIA LIUZZA
text: I was nervous about ordering from Brushy Mountain because of the handful of bad reviews. If there had been more, I probably would have found another way. As it was, I went ahead and took a chance. Everything came very quickly and the entire order was shipped together. Prices were better with Brushy Mountain and they had everything I wanted instead of having to piecemeal it together with other companies. I hope that Brushy Mountain can fix the issues they have so that people will be more confident buying from them in the future.
